title.narrative: POLITICAL COMMITTMENT & ADVOCACY

description.narrative: Strengthened political commitment to legislate and budget for strengthening interventions that prevent and respond to violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Reducing Child Poverty, Social Protection And Child Poverty, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, National legislation is implemented to prevent, mitigate and address violence and other childhood abuses and the justice, education, public health, security and other sectors observe children's rights to this protection

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened political commitment to legislate and budget for strengthening interventions that prevent and respond to violence,abuse, exploitation and neglect

description.narrative: In 2021, the Belize CO continued to advocate for political commitment to support the modernization of the civil registration system to ensure those migrant children, and families have access to critical birth registration system; a comprehensive package of social services to vulnerable families affected by violence, abuse, and neglect including CMEU and Child Labor. Resulting from these interventions over 35,000 persons and 15,000 children were reached and engaged through the dissemination of materials and access to social services.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2022
